about_the_game:
Hey, we've got a bit of an emergency. The kids have turned the house into a warzone while partying, and they're asking for our help. I've got the supplies and the van ready. We need to hit the road and renovate the house. We've got plenty more flipping projects to do, so don't let the company down!

Cleaning: Fun? Here's Proof!

Has your place turned into a bit of a trash mountain lately? Don't worry, team up with us and let's conquer these mountains together! Turning the cleaning process into a lost sock hunt is our specialty. With our relaxing gameplay approach, even the toughest messes can be enjoyable to tackle. Remember, there might be a treasure in every pile of trash... or at least we can find your lost piggy bank!

Special Toys

Easily tackle tough stains and bacteria with a steam mop, swiftly clear dust and dirt with a vacuum cleaner and robot vacuum cleaner, erase stains with a sponge, and polish surfaces with a dust cloth. Each tool offers unique abilities in the cleaning battle, ensuring sparkling homes.

name: Emergency Cleanup Co. Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A simulation game that you work for a cleaning company and tackle various maps, including offices, movie theaters, homes, and wrestling gyms. Showcase your cleaning skills in single-player mode across different locations. Prove your professionalism in this challenging cleaning adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
